messages.content:
You are tasked with adding English translations to a set of stakeholder quotes. For each quote:
- If the quote is in English, add "N.A." as the translation
- If the quote is in any other language, provide an accurate English translation

Input format is a markdown table with stakeholder names and quotes.
Output should be a markdown table with three columns: name, original quote, and translation.

IMPORTANT RULES:
- Never translate English quotes to English - use "N.A." instead.
- Only and always translate non-English quotes.
- If the original quote, in the third column of the md table is not in english, translate it and add the translation in the 4th column, as described below, but that is only when the quote is not in English.
- Keep original quotes exactly as they are.
- Maintain the markdown table format, without including any horizontal divider lines

Example input:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." |

Example output:
| Pierre Dupont | Consumer | "Cette décision est importante." | "This decision is important." |
| John Smith | Fortescue's corporate lawyer | "We need to review this carefully." | N.A. |

Example input:
| [Person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,eyc..)] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] |

Example output:
| [person Name 1] | Person Role 1 | [Original Quote in another language (e.g. Dutch, French, German, Spanish,etc..)] | [Translated Quote] |
| [person Name 2] | Person Role 2 | [Original Quote in English] | N.A. |

If the input is "None", return "None". if the original quote is not in English, make sure it is translated. Add "N.A" if the quote is already in English.

Input quotes:
| Bartlomiej Kolodziejczyk | Ex-chief scientist | "Fortescue says its ex-chief scientist Bartlomiej Kolodziejczyk and technology development lead Bjorn Winther-Jensen applied green-iron technology they helped develop while working for the miner to form rival startup Element Zero." |
| Bjorn Winther-Jensen | Technology development lead | "Fortescue says its ex-chief scientist Bartlomiej Kolodziejczyk and technology development lead Bjorn Winther-Jensen applied green-iron technology they helped develop while working for the miner to form rival startup Element Zero." |
| Michael Masterman | Chief executive of Element Zero | "Fortescue is suing the men as well as Element Zero and its chief executive, Michael Masterman." |
| Justice Brigitte Markovic | Federal Court Justice | "Justice Brigitte Markovic also ordered the former employees pay Fortescue's legal costs for contesting the application." |
| Justice Melissa Perry | Federal Court Justice | "In granting the search order, Justice Perry said there was a strong prima facie case from Fortescue and if the searches had been flagged in advance there was a real risk information might be destroyed or 'squirrelled away'." |
| Lawyers for Fortescue | Legal representatives | "Lawyers for Fortescue labelled the bid to retroactively overturn the search order a 'monumental waste of time' and an attempt to avoid properly facing the allegations being levelled at the ex-employees." |

| Bartlomiej Kolodziejczyk | Ex-chief scientist | "Fortescue says its ex-chief scientist Bartlomiej Kolodziejczyk and technology development lead Bjorn Winther-Jensen applied green-iron technology they helped develop while working for the miner to form rival startup Element Zero." | N.A. |
| Bjorn Winther-Jensen | Technology development lead | "Fortescue says its ex-chief scientist Bartlomiej Kolodziejczyk and technology development lead Bjorn Winther-Jensen applied green-iron technology they helped develop while working for the miner to form rival startup Element Zero." | N.A. |
| Michael Masterman | Chief executive of Element Zero | "Fortescue is suing the men as well as Element Zero and its chief executive, Michael Masterman." | N.A. |
| Justice Brigitte Markovic | Federal Court Justice | "Justice Brigitte Markovic also ordered the former employees pay Fortescue's legal costs for contesting the application." | N.A. |
| Justice Melissa Perry | Federal Court Justice | "In granting the search order, Justice Perry said there was a strong prima facie case from Fortescue and if the searches had been flagged in advance there was a real risk information might be destroyed or 'squirrelled away'." | N.A. |
| Lawyers for Fortescue | Legal representatives | "Lawyers for Fortescue labelled the bid to retroactively overturn the search order a 'monumental waste of time' and an attempt to avoid properly facing the allegations being levelled at the ex-employees." | N.A. |
